title: Online Booking System
description:
Food Mall Customer app (Android, iOS) Flutter
- The customers can register themselves through several alternatives such as mobile phones, emails, and social media accounts. There is robust back-end support available as well.
- It is easily possible to specify the details of your location either automatically or manually. There is a tracking facility available. It helps in keeping up with the current status of the order.
- Searching for food and restaurants: The consumers to quickly search the available restaurants in the area close by for food items.
- You will be notified about everything from food preparation in the restaurants to delivery to the doorstep. Customers will get alerts every instant.
- Secure multi-payment alternatives: All authenticity interfaces are in place. There are third-party payment modules available that permit the consumers to make payments after receiving an order.
- Food seekers get advanced filtering alternatives such as organic, most-accessed, rating-based, and type of cuisine categories.
- Different consumers have direct access to alternatives available to the order history for quicker ordering the next time around.
- The user will have to register with the necessary info. He or she can register and log in to the app.
- Users can then go to the home page to nail down the specific items and stores.
- All your selected items will get annexed to the cart seamlessly.
- You can select from the various payment alternatives available. Make a payment and confirm the address where the food needs to be delivered.
- Users will be able to track the live location status of their order with a tracking feature in the app.
- The grocery products or food items are delivered to the consumer through the delivery executive.
- In the end, the users can rate their overall experience and food quality through the rating facility and reviews area.

Live running app link : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mallplusmm.mallPlusCustomer
